alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cameron; Coastal Willacy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 15 at 12:59PM CST until January 16 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CST TUESDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30. For the second Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 31 possible. * WHERE...Coastal Willacy and Coastal Cameron Counties. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until 4 PM CST this afternoon. For the second Freeze Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 10 AM CST Tuesday. For the Freeze Watch, from Tuesday evening through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
